Key Match Events: Travis Head scored 59 runs off 23 deliveries
Sam Curran conceded 30 runs in one over
England's thin batting was exposed, leading to a quick collapse after reaching 106 for four
Pre-Game Insights: England's first limited-overs game since announcing Brendon McCullum as the new red- and white-ball coach
England's three T20 debutants struggled, with Jordan Cox scoring 17 and Jacob Bethell managing just two runs
Post-Match Reflections: Phil Salt acknowledged the need to improve, stating that Jofra Archer needs more time to develop into a world-class all-rounder
England will have a chance at redemption in Cardiff on Friday
